last_episode_to_air.name: Interrogation Log #8
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Suits close in on the truth. Sudha and Mahesh have different ideas on their business and future while Bhanu, Kamal, and Vinod all lose in the game of love… culminating in a shocking Season 1 cliffhanger.

name: The Pradeeps of Pittsburgh
overview: The Pradeeps attempt to prove their innocence to a pair of investigating government agents by recounting their initial life in America after moving from India. Though each family member has a different perspective on the events, they weave together a story of humor, heartbreak, and the often-complicated pursuit of their respective American Dreams.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The Pradeeps attempt to prove their innocence to a pair of investigating government agents by recounting their initial life in America after moving from India. Though each family member has a different perspective on the events, they weave together a story of humor, heartbreak, and the often-complicated pursuit of their respective American Dreams.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #1
episodes.overview: Under investigation by a pair of suit-clad government agents, the Pradeep family recount their arrival to America, complete with professional obstacles, dead rabbits, and most of all, their neighbor Stu.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #2
episodes.overview: The Suits start piecing together the Pradeeps’ initial relationship with their neighbors as the kids begin school. Bhanu stumbles upon a money-making idea, Vinod finds his crew, and Kamal develops a crush on his teacher.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #3
episodes.overview: The Pradeeps endure roadblocks on their way to the American dream. Mahesh is denied a business loan while Sudha’s medical license is rejected. Vinod gets into a love triangle. Bhanu and Stu “break bad” in Ohio while Kamal faces a psychiatrist and the horrors of a dirty basketball.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #4
episodes.overview: Sudha looks for purpose by selling supplements in competition with Janice, but finds a new opportunity through Mahesh. Bhanu hits the dirty corners of the internet to learn about sex. Vinod tries to mend the fence of friendship.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #5
episodes.overview: Mahesh and Jimbo go hunting to woo an investor for Mahesh’s rocket business. Sudha reaches into the past to re-connect with her increasingly wayward daughter. Bhanu agrees to a “big ask” to get closer with Stu.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #6
episodes.overview: It’s Halloween! Lines that should not be crossed get crossed at the Mills Annual Ghoul-a when Sudha seizes on a chance to break up Bhanu and Stu. The Pradeep kids team up to get revenge on Vinod’s bully.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #7
episodes.overview: Mahesh takes a more active role in Kamal’s life when his grades start to suspiciously slip. Vinod meets an internet “celebrity” much to Bhanu’s dismay. Stu tries to get over the trauma of what he saw at the Halloween party.

episodes.name: Interrogation Log #8
episodes.overview: The Suits close in on the truth. Sudha and Mahesh have different ideas on their business and future while Bhanu, Kamal, and Vinod all lose in the game of love… culminating in a shocking Season 1 cliffhanger.

Though each family member has a different perspective on the events, they weave together a story of humor, heartbreak, and the often-complicated pursuit of their respective American Dreams.
